评论详情: This is the most absolutely adorable sleeper I have ever seen. The quality is great, thick. The strawberry pattern is so cute and sweet, but the little bow on on the front makes the whole thing so much more adorable.

Perfect fit, nice and soft too!  Sooooooo cute!
Excellent material, as presented, arrived quickly
This was so cute. The colors were bright and I would definitely buy from them again
So cute! Thank you 😊

My little one was so cute in this. I just which she didn't out grow it so fast.

cute but for some reason i thought this was a zippie but its buttons

Quality is excellent. Given as a gift and have not received any feedback.
